name: Never Coming Down
description:
This game was created in 72 hours for the 7th Scorespace game jam.

Instructions:
WASD to move, Shift to run, Space to Jump. 
LMB to fire Antigravity Spikes out of your chaingun,       

RMB to throw a Gravball (when available)
Press Space in midair to use your Booster Pack. The fuel gauge will appear in the center of the screen. Pressing LCTRL after using your booster pack will send you back to the ground quicker.
